How To Install..?

AgenPro, to Install it < 1st press enter to boot from cd /dvd , 2nd press f1 to go to the menu , 3rd use intall with all drivers ( the 3rd one from up ) , that is it < it contains a lot of drivers and will recognize yr computer , this widow is advanced version of the windows essentials , uploaded long time ago and has very nice install screen , it is fast and compatible with all programs I used , there is no key required or activation , Nice scheme , I advice u in all xps to disable restore and automatic updates , and use image for Hard disk instead , thanks a lot for the uploader
use any IMG burn software to make the cd from the Iso file , I used Ashampoo ver 7 ( very old ) to prepare the cd from the Iso file , that is all

well, after a month of using it , I prefere windows xp Black edition , but it is better than the normal xp, the only advantage of it from my point of view, it has a driver for my LCD screen and driver for audio . not really a great advantage as I can install them externally , now I will look for the latest version of the XP Blac edition
